attributes.action: Ban the selling of rat poisons and slugs repellents
attributes.additional_details:
Please SHARE this for poison awareness.

Ban the sale and use of poison for rats or mice and slugs repellents.

The ingestion of rat poison is an unfortunately common occurrence in dogs. Many people do not realize that the taste of rodenticide is not only appealing to dogs, but that it also has the potential to kill dogs.
It is also well known that Owls and other predators sometimes prey on rodents that have eaten poison causing death.
In addition any other domestic pet and also children are at risk.

This poisons will cause a slow and agonizing death!

               -PLEASE SIGN AND SHARE-

   I BELIEVE THAT PETITIONS CAN MAKE A CHANGE :)
